about_the_game:
Become an adventurer and dive into dangerous dungeons to obtain powerful equipment!

Once you have powerful equipment?　Venture further into the dungeon!

Party: Form a party with various professions. Each of them can use their own unique skills. You may even meet new friends during your adventures...?

Dungeons: The shape changes each time you enter a dungeon, and you will never see the same structure twice. Not only structures, but also inhabitants, treasure chests, and even traps await adventurers.

Equipment: The same type of equipment will have different parameters and many additional effects. Equipment of higher rarity tends to have more powerful effects.

The dungeon is full of attractions!　Let's go on an adventure now!

But...If you get wiped out, it's game over! The slightest carelessness can be fatal!

What is DOT & DOT DUNGEONS?

DOT & DOT DUNGEONS is an RPG in which players challenge themselves in dungeons whose structure changes each time they dive. The equipment you obtain will be randomly selected, and sometimes it can be of immense capacity. What awaits the player at the end of his or her dungeon wanderings in search of the ideal equipment?

Nostalgic Graphics and Sound

The dungeons that await the player and the monsters that inhabit them are depicted using 8-bit-style dots, and the sounds that color the adventure are created using tones and tunes that are reminiscent of retro video game consoles. Enjoy the nostalgic feeling of “this is the kind of game that might have existed in the past.

A variety of unique professions and skills

Players become “adventurers” who can handle anything with ease, and form a party with up to four members, including a “knight” who excels at physical attacks, a “monk” who heals, and a “mage” who is an expert in offensive spells. As you gain experience and grow through battle, you will learn the skills associated with each profession. As the adventure progresses, you may meet new friends...?

Dungeons and gimmicks with as many stories as there are players.

There is no story line in this game. The story line does not exist in this game, because each experience in the dungeon is a story for each player. The structure of the dungeon changes each time you enter it, and there are “spike traps” that reduce your HP and “teleporters” that send you somewhere on the floor. On the other hand, there are also “stone monuments” that randomly grant good effects to the party, “healers” that heal for a fee, and “treasure chests,” the most coveted items, that help the adventurer. And when you defeat the boss waiting for you at the far end of the dungeon... you will be shown a new path to adventure.

name: DOT & DOT DUNGEONS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 615
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Adventure in dungeons that change every time you enter! The equipment you get in the dungeon is randomly selected to determine its strength! What will you see at the end of your adventure?
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
